security_issues.message: Ensure Amazon EKS control plane logging is enabled for all log types
Ensure EKS Cluster has Secrets Encryption Enabled
Ensure Amazon EKS public endpoint disabled
Ensure Amazon EKS public endpoint not accessible to 0.0.0.0/0

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability AVD-AWS-0038
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: Control plane controller manager logging is not enabled.
Link: [AVD-AWS-0038](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/avd-aws-0038)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability AVD-AWS-0040
Severity: CRITICAL
Message: Public cluster access is enabled.
Link: [AVD-AWS-0040](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/avd-aws-0040)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability AVD-AWS-0041
Severity: CRITICAL
Message: Cluster allows access from a public CIDR: 0.0.0.0/0
Link: [AVD-AWS-0041](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/avd-aws-0041)
Ensure CloudWatch log groups retains logs for at least 1 year
Ensure Terraform module sources use a commit hash
Ensure that Security Groups are attached to another resource
Ensure no IAM policies documents allow "*" as a statement's resource for restrictable actions
Ensure IAM policies does not allow write access without constraints
Ensure that Security Groups are attached to another resource

Artifact: node_groups.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-public-egress-sgr
Severity: CRITICAL
Message: Security group rule allows unrestricted egress to any IP address.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-public-egress-sgr](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-public-egress-sgr)

Artifact: node_groups.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-public-egress-sgr
Severity: CRITICAL
Message: Security group rule allows unrestricted egress to any IP address.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-public-egress-sgr](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-public-egress-sgr)
Ensure Instance Metadata Service Version 1 is not enabled
Ensure Launch template should not have a metadata response hop limit greater than 1
Ensure Instance Metadata Service Version 1 is not enabled
Ensure Launch template should not have a metadata response hop limit greater than 1
Ensure that Security Groups are attached to another resource
Ensure no IAM policies documents allow "*" as a statement's resource for restrictable actions
Ensure IAM policies does not allow write access without constraints

unassigned_findings.message:
Artifact: modules/karpenter/policy.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability AVD-AWS-0342
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: IAM policy allows 'iam:PassRole' action
Link: [AVD-AWS-0342](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/avd-aws-0342)
